incluticDesc: INCLTICS is a National Polytechnic School project, which allows people to access social inclusion applications. The team has professionals who can help you find technological resources that can meet your needs.
Programas de software que utilizan gráfi: Software programs that use graphics, pictograms, and speech synthesizers to help people with mobility limitations in their communication
Recursos tecnológicos que permiten acced: Technological resources that allow access to technology and use the computer to all people, regardless of their mobility limitations
Software que los profesionales de terapi: Software that therapy professionals can use in activities such as: consultation, research, diagnosis, rehabilitation and control
Software que puede ser utilizado para la: Software that can be used to practice activities designed to maintain or improve physical health conditions.
Software que permite identificar lugares: Software that allows to identify places that lack architectural barriers and allow access to people regardless of their physical limitations
Software de entretenimiento y aprendizaj: Entertainment and learning software that allows to perceive the reality of people with motor limitations.
